0.text: Innate: Shaco's basic attacks are empowered to deal 20 − 35 (based on level) (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus physical damage when hitting an enemy from behind. Backstab is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
0.html: Innate: Shaco's basic attacks are empowered to deal 20 − 35 (based on level) (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus physical damage when hitting an enemy from behind. Backstab is affected by critical strike modifiers.

1.text: Deceive and  Two-Shiv Poison have additional effects when they hit an enemy from behind.
1.html: Deceive and Two-Shiv Poison have additional effects when they hit an enemy from behind.

0.text: Active: Shaco becomes  invisible for a few seconds, and after a 0.125-second delay he  blinks to the target location.
0.html: Active: Shaco becomes invisible for a few seconds, and after a 0.125-second delay he blinks to the target location.

1.text: Deceive's  invisibility breaks when Shaco uses a basic attack or casts  Two-Shiv Poison, but not from casting  Hallucinate.
1.html: Deceive's invisibility breaks when Shaco uses a basic attack or casts Two-Shiv Poison, but not from casting Hallucinate.

2.text: After breaking the invisibility, Shaco empowers his next basic attack within 0.25 seconds to deal bonus physical damage, which is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
2.html: After breaking the invisibility, Shaco empowers his next basic attack within 0.25 seconds to deal bonus physical damage, which is affected by critical strike modifiers.

3.text: Backstab Bonus: The attack will  critically strike for (30% +  35%) bonus physical damage.
3.html: Backstab Bonus: The attack will critically strike for (30% +  35%) bonus physical damage.

4.text: Deceive will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
4.html: Deceive will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Shaco summons a box at the target location that becomes  stealthed after arming over 2 seconds, lasting for up to 40 (+ 10% AP) seconds. The box is  invulnerable and  untargetable to enemies while stealthed.
0.html: Active: Shaco summons a box at the target location that becomes stealthed after arming over 2 seconds, lasting for up to 40 (+ 10% AP) seconds. The box is invulnerable and untargetable to enemies while stealthed.

1.text: The box will spring out upon enemy contact,  fearing nearby enemies and reducing their  movement speed for 2 seconds, modified against  champions, who are also  rooted for 0.5 seconds. Enemy champions have their movement speed set to a static 100, reduced to a static 60 for non-champions.
1.html: The box will spring out upon enemy contact, fearing nearby enemies and reducing their  movement speed for 2 seconds, modified against champions, who are also rooted for 0.5 seconds. Enemy champions have their movement speed set to a static 100, reduced to a static 60 for non-champions.

2.text: The box will remain for 5 seconds, during which it will automatically fire at nearby  visible enemies every 0.5 seconds, dealing magic damage with each attack that is increased against  monsters and reduced by 50% against  structures. If the box attacks only one target, it deals increased damage.
2.html: The box will remain for 5 seconds, during which it will automatically fire at nearby visible enemies every 0.5 seconds, dealing magic damage with each attack that is increased against monsters and reduced by 50% against structures. If the box attacks only one target, it deals increased damage.

3.text: See Pets for more details about boxes.
3.html: See Pets for more details about boxes.

0.text: Passive: Shaco's basic attacks  slow enemies for 2 seconds while Two-Shiv Poison is not on cooldown.
0.html: Passive: Shaco's basic attacks slow enemies for 2 seconds while Two-Shiv Poison is not on cooldown.

1.text: Active: Shaco throws a dagger at the target enemy that deal magic damage,  increased by 50% if they are below 30% of their maximum health, and  slows them for 3 seconds.
1.html: Active: Shaco throws a dagger at the target enemy that deal magic damage, increased by 50% if they are below 30% of their maximum health, and slows them for 3 seconds.

2.text: Backstab Bonus: The dagger deals an additional 15 − 50 (based on level) (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage, increased to 22.5 − 75 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) when the target is below 30% of their maximum health.
2.html: Backstab Bonus: The dagger deals an additional 15 − 50 (based on level) (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage, increased to 22.5 − 75 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) when the target is below 30% of their maximum health.

0.text: Active: Shaco  vanishes for 0.5 seconds and  blinks in the target direction while creating a  clone of himself that is summoned in the opposite direction, remaining within control range of him as a controllable  clone for up to 18 seconds. Hallucinate can be recast at any time while the clone is alive, and can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
0.html:
Active: Shaco vanishes for 0.5 seconds and blinks in the target direction while creating a clone of himself that is summoned in the opposite direction, remaining within control range of him as a controllable clone for up to 18 seconds.

Hallucinate can be recast at any time while the clone is alive, and can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.

1.text: Recast: Shaco commands the  clone to move to the target location.
1.html: Recast: Shaco commands the clone to move to the target location.

2.text: The clone will explode upon dying or expiring, which deals magic damage to nearby enemies and deploys three  mini-boxes that activate instantly,  fearing nearby enemies for 1 second.
2.html: The clone will explode upon dying or expiring, which deals magic damage to nearby enemies and deploys three mini-boxes that activate instantly, fearing nearby enemies for 1 second.

3.text: The boxes possess Jack in the Box's effects, except they have a doubled, but shared  health, and deal modified magic damage with each attack, increased when attacking a single unit.
3.html: The boxes possess Jack in the Box's effects, except they have a doubled, but shared  health, and deal modified magic damage with each attack, increased when attacking a single unit.

4.text: See Pets for more details about Shaco's clone.
4.html: See Pets for more details about Shaco's clone.

abilities.concerningText: Active: Shaco becomes  invisible for a few seconds, and after a 0.125-second delay he  blinks to the target location.
After breaking the invisibility, Shaco empowers his next basic attack within 0.25 seconds to deal bonus physical damage, which is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

The box will spring out upon enemy contact,  fearing nearby enemies and reducing their  movement speed for 2 seconds, modified against  champions, who are also  rooted for 0.5 seconds. Enemy champions have their movement speed set to a static 100, reduced to a static 60 for non-champions.

The box will remain for 5 seconds, during which it will automatically fire at nearby  visible enemies every 0.5 seconds, dealing magic damage with each attack that is increased against  monsters and reduced by 50% against  structures. If the box attacks only one target, it deals increased damage.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+7% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all of this item's effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+18 Lethality (11.2 − 18 (based on level) armor penetration)

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Nightstalker: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals ( 75 / 55) (+ ( 30% / 25%) bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets this effect's cooldown and grants you invisibility for 1.5 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 bonus movement speed, and 5 ability haste.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – NIGHTSTALKER: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals ( 75 /  55) (+ ( 30% /  25%) bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and  slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Scoring a  takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets this effect's cooldown and grants you  invisibility for 1.5 seconds.

1.originHTML: +  +  900

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and restores mana equal to 40% base AD (+ 16% bonus AD) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and restores mana equal to 40% base AD (+ 16% bonus AD) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
